name: flickr.people.getInfo
authentication: This method does not require authentication.

arguments.name: api_key
arguments.description: Your API application key.See herefor more details.

arguments.name: user_id
arguments.description: The NSID of the user to fetch information about.

response:
<person nsid="12037949754@N01" ispro="0" iconserver="122" iconfarm="1">
  <username>bees</username>
  <realname>Cal Henderson</realname>
  <mbox_sha1sum>eea6cd28e3d0003ab51b0058a684d94980b727ac</mbox_sha1sum>
  <location>Vancouver, Canada</location>
  <photosurl>http://www.flickr.com/photos/bees/</photosurl>
  <profileurl>http://www.flickr.com/people/bees/</profileurl>
  <photos>
    <firstdate>1071510391</firstdate>
    <firstdatetaken>1900-09-02 09:11:24</firstdatetaken>
    <count>449</count>
  </photos>
</person>

errors.title: User not foundThe user id passed did not match a Flickr user.
User deletedThe user id passed matched a deleted Flickr user.
Invalid API KeyThe API key passed was not valid or has expired.
Service currently unavailableThe requested service is temporarily unavailable.
Write operation failedThe requested operation failed due to a temporary issue.
Format "xxx" not foundThe requested response format was not found.
Method "xxx" not foundThe requested method was not found.
Invalid SOAP envelopeThe SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.
Invalid XML-RPC Method CallThe XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.
Bad URL foundOne or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.
